verbose_text: A voxel based morphometry (VBM) analysis demonstrated white matter (WM) volume loss with increasing disease duration in the midbrain, and a positron emission tomography (PET) study which labelled activated microglia and activated astrocytes detected neuroinflammation in several locations, with the midbrain having the strongest statistics.
